content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: looks good to go

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: short (time), simple (io) and easy

Good for reverse because of hints:
Only socks as outputs 
Socks come usually as pairs should be common sense
Sorting is obvious enough, as the primary criteria is an integer ascending

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Seems good to go.

You should use a test case when the # of digits is different for different socks color

2
sock 5 blue
sock 42 red

even if socks size 5  does not really exist, to deal with "code golf" solutions that considers a line as a single text (I did it, language : bash)

if you don't want to add this test, you should add a constraint e.g. "for socks : 21 < size < 46" that allows the socks size to be treated as a text.

This puzzle is the same as that one → https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/49253553dfe57ec42ebabdf3353e0f635a45

I adapt it as a CoC because some other players think it's more a CoC puzzle than a Classic one.
